general.byline: Lighting / Level Artist in London, UK, He/Him
general.about: MA in Games Art graduate with 5+ years in real-time archviz, VR/AR, and animation using Unreal Engine, Blender, and Cinema4D. Skilled in various design tools, passionate about tech art, procedural content, and currently exploring film effects emulation in Unreal Engine.

workExperience.heading: 3D Generalist at Intellectual Point
workExperience.description: Worked on a number of 3D (still and animated), motion-design, and VR projects for a US-based IT company for marketing and educational purposes. Primarily in Unreal Engine, Blender and After Effects.
workExperience.title: 3D Generalist

workExperience.heading: Motion Designer at Design Factory India
workExperience.description:
Primary role was producing animations and visuals on historical and cultural topics, for display in museums and exhibition spaces. Dealt with creating solutions for technical and creative aspects of projection mapping animations on large-scale exterior and interior surfaces.\
\
Also worked on research, concept development, copywriting, photo editing, illustrations, UI design, sound design, 3D modelling/rendering, and client presentations for various design projects.
workExperience.title: Motion Designer

workExperience.heading: Architectural Visualiser at Point Construction
workExperience.description:
Worked with an architecture studio on an interior design project to create real-time walkthroughs and cinematics with Unreal Engine.\
\
Responsibilities included translating construction drawings to 3D scenes and assets, importing to UE4, lighting, shading, post-processing, and compositing.
workExperience.title: Architectural Visualiser

workExperience.heading: Technical Artist at VRRT
workExperience.description:
Worked as the Unreal Engine specialist in a visualisation studio on a variety of projects ranging from interactive furniture showcases to real-time interior walkthroughs.\
\
Responsibilities included importing existing scenes and assets to UE4, lighting, shading, post-processing, and creating visuals and cinematics.
workExperience.title: Technical Artist

workExperience.heading: Architectural Intern at Innovarch
workExperience.description: Worked with a team of architects to create technical drawings, traditional 3D visuals, and walkthroughs for projects of various scales
workExperience.title: Architectural Intern

education.heading: MA Game Art and Design at University of Hertfordshire
education.description: Graduated with a portfolio in Lighting Art. Working primarily in Unreal Engine and other 3D softwares.

certifications.heading: Introduction to User Experience Design from Coursera
certifications.name: Introduction to User Experience Design
